    • Method Detail

      • load

        public static org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.PDDocument load​(byte[] contents)
                                                 throws DocumentProcessingException
        Loads a PDDocument given its byte contents.

        The returned object must later be closes (see close(PDDocument)).

        Parameters:
        contents - the PDF file contents
        Returns:
        a loaded PDDocument object
        Throws:
        DocumentProcessingException - for loading errors

      • close

        public static void close​(org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.PDDocument document)
        Closes an open PDDocument object and releases its allocated resources.
        Parameters:
        document - the document to close

      • toBytes

        public static byte[] toBytes​(org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.PDDocument document)
                      throws DocumentProcessingException
        Encodes the supplied PDF document into a byte array.
        Parameters:
        document - the document to encode
        Returns:
        a byte array of the contents
        Throws:
        DocumentProcessingException - for processing errors

      • insertDocument

        public static org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.PDDocument insertDocument​(org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.PDDocument document,
                                                                  org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.PDDocument insertDocument,
                                                                  int page)
                                                           throws DocumentProcessingException
        Inserts the insertDocument in document at position page (1-based). This means that the given page number is the page number for the first page of the insertDocument after insertion.
        Parameters:
        document - the document to be updated (will be closed)
        insertDocument - the document to insert
        page - the page (1-based) number where to insert, 0 means at the end of the file
        Returns:
        the updated document
        Throws:
        DocumentProcessingException - for errors
